game.title: Revised Game Title

paragraph: The player must face a malevolent dragon that has taken over the kingdom, shrouding it in darkness.
If successful, they are granted wealth and ascend to the throne, becoming the new ruler of the realm.
Will the protagonist rise to this daunting task and restore balance to the kingdom?
The player's skills and intellect are put to the test as they engage in a battle to save the land and its people.
The ultimate decision hangs in the balance.

game.ending: Here concludes the game, marking an epic conclusion for the hero's journey.
